0a8b3d6f-3d77-4ec0-99e7-39ce3ce95a1d: The {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} of this character are decreased by −10, and {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g} is decreased by −1.

357f7dc7-dc82-4679-8654-240a06b6ffce:
